about.LicenseAgreement: Pogwiritsa ntchito pulogalamuyi, mukuvomereza mawu a pangano la pulogalamu ya Neuralium. Mutha kuwona mawonekedwe aposachedwa a mgwirizano wamapulogalamu apa:

account.PleaseImportOrCreateWalletAccount: Chondeitanitsa kapena kupanga akaunti ya chikwama

verifyAccount.Title: Chitsimikizo cha Akaunti
verifyAccount.IntroductionText: Pofuna kupewa kuzunzidwa, njira yopangira akauntiyi iyenera kudutsa mtundu wina wotsimikizira. Kutengera ndi komwe muli, zosankha zosiyanasiyana zilipo.
verifyAccount.ResultsSuccess: Zowonetsera izi zinali zopambana! ID yanu ya akaunti tsopano imatsimikiziridwa ndi foni.
verifyAccount.ResultsFailure: Kutsimikizira kunali kolephera. Mutha kuyesanso pakatha maola 24.
verifyAccount.DefaultHelpText: Apa muyenera kusankha njira yotsimikizira pakati pazosankha zomwe zilipo. Njira iliyonse imakhala ndi zabwino komanso zopindulitsa. Chonde sankhani chomwe chikuyenera inu.
verifyAccount.TESTNETHelpText: Mu TESTNET, kutsimikizika kwitha kudutsidwa ndikupanga akaunti yomweyo.
verifyAccount.AppointmentsHelpText: Muyamba njira yotsimikizira za Neuralium. Njirayi imatha kukhala masiku ambiri ndipo mudzayenera kupezeka kuti mudzakhalako nthawiyo itatsimikizika. Zabwino: osadziwika.
verifyAccount.POWHelpText: Muyenera kupereka chitsimikizo cha ntchito cha CPU chamtengo wapatali. Mukamaliza, akaunti yanu idzatha kukhala mgulu la 1 ndi 2 ngati Server.

appointments.Title: Chitsimikizo Chosankhidwa
appointments.IntroductionText: Kupitilira kwa ntchito kumapangidwira kuti zitsimikizire ogwiritsa ntchito pomwe akusunga madzi osefukira mu dongosolo.
appointments.RequestAppointmentText: Kuti muyambitse ntchitoyi, chonde pemphani nthawi yokumana. Pempho losankhidwa lidzapangidwa ndipo chitsimikiziro chiyenera kulandiridwa nthawi ina mtsogolo.
appointments.VerificationRequestSent: Pempho lotsimikizika kuti mwasankhidwa latumizidwa bwino
appointments.AppointmentRequestedText: Mwasankhidwa kale. Tiyenera tsopano kudikirira chitsimikizo.
appointments.AppointmentConfirmedText: Pempho lanu latsimikiziridwa ndipo tsiku ndi nthawi tsopano zakonzedwa. Onetsetsani kuti mwakhalapo munthawi yake!
appointments.AppointmentVerificationRequestedText: Pempho lotsimikizira zofunikira kusankha lidatumizidwa. Tsopano tikuyembekezera chitsimikizo.
appointments.InvalidPuzzleEngineVersion: Mtundu wovomerezeka wa injini yamapulogalamu. Chonde sinthani mtundu wanu.

puzzles.Title: Zithunzi
puzzles.TimeBeforeAppointment: Gawo lanu la zithunzi lidzayamba posachedwa. Katsala nthawi yotsala musanapemphe nthawi yanu
puzzles.WaitingForPuzzle: gawo lazithunzi liyenera kuyamba nthawi iliyonse tsopano. Pano tikuyembekezera malangizo a puzzle ...
puzzles.CompletedAndSend: Zilankhulo zanu zamalizidwa. Chonde dikirani pamene zotsatira zakonzedwa.
puzzles.PreparingPackage: Chonde dikirani pamene ntchito yoikiratu ikutsiriza ndikutumiza zotsatira kuti zitsimikizidwe.

sms.Title: Kutsimikiza kwa SMS
sms.ConfirmationCodeHint: Nambala yotsimikizira yomwe mungakhale mutapeza nthawi yokumana.
sms.PhoneNumberHint: Nambala yafoni komwe mungalandire uthenga wa SMS.
sms.SmsCodeHint: Khodi yotsimikizira yomwe mwalandira ndi uthenga wa SMS.
sms.IntroductionText: Apa tikutsimikizira akaunti yanu pogwiritsa ntchito nambala yolondola ya foni.
sms.InvalidChineseConfiguration: Ku China, chifukwa chovuta kutumiza SMS, Code yotsimikizika yovomerezeka iyenera kupezedwa kaye.
sms.InvalidPhoneFormat: Mtundu wosavomerezeka wa nambala ya foni
sms.ResultsSuccess: Zowonetsera izi zinali zopambana! ID yanu ya akaunti tsopano imatsimikiziridwa ndi foni.
sms.ResultsFailure: Kutsimikizira kunali kolephera. Mutha kuyesanso pakatha maola 24.

accountPublication.AccountPublicationProcessExplanation: Musanagwire ntchito iliyonse pa blockchain, akaunti yanu iyenera kuperekedwa kwa ena. Akaunti yanu idzatsimikiziridwa, ndipo izikhala yokonzeka kugwira ntchito ikatsimikiziridwa mu block.
accountPublication.AccountPublicationFailed: Panali vuto potulutsa akaunti. Kutulutsa kwalephera.
accountPublication.CanCloseWindow: Tsopano mutha kutseka zenera ili bwinobwino podikirira kuti chitsimikiziro chifike.
accountPublication.NeedBlockchainSynced: Blockchain imafunika kulumikizidwa kuti ipange akaunti.
accountPublication.NeedPeerToPublish: Palibe anzanu okwanira kulumikizana kuti ayambe kufalitsa akaunti.

app.PleaseEnterYourPassphraseLastAttempt: Chonde lowetsani kuyesa kwanu komaliza kwa Phassphrase
app.PleaseCopyYourKeyFile: Chonde koperani fayilo yanu pachikwama chanu.
app.TermsOfServiceCheck: Chongani apa kuti muwonetse kuti mwawerengera ndikuvomereza zantchito.
app.TermsOfServiceClick: Mwa kuwonekera Inde ndi / kapena kugwiritsa ntchito pulogalamuyi mumavomereza zogwirizana ndi ntchito
app.ServerRunningStop: Seva ya Neuralium node ikugwirabe ntchito. Kodi mukufuna kuyimitsa?

contact.AddContactExplanation: Onjezani cholowa ndikulowetsa ID yawo ya akaunti ndi dzina la ogwiritsa ntchito.
contact.AlreadyExists: Kulumikizana ndi {{name}} kulipo kale ndi ID {{{id}}
contact.Title: Makampani
contact.Explain: Anzanu ndi manambala aakaunti awo kuti mufike mwachangu.

dashboard.Title: Dashboard
dashboard.Explain: Mfundo yayikulu pa blockchain ndi akaunti yanu (ma) akaunti.

history.Title: Kusinthanitsa
history.Explain: Mbiri yanu yosinthira yokhala ndi tsatanetsatane waukadaulo wamkati mwawo

mining.ExplainInfoPanel: Chiwerengero chamapulogalamu ambiri amawu abwino okhudza migodi yanu
mining.Explain: Apa mutha kuyika kompyuta yanu pakuyipangitsa kuti ipange masamu azithunzi kuti mutsegule ma Neuraliums atsopano.
mining.Miningportalert: Chidziwitso: Kuti ndikhale ndi ine, doko lanu la TCP liyenera kulumikizidwa ndi mitundu ina pa p2p. Kugawana ndiko ulemu woyenera pa p2p. Ngati mukufuna kukhala mgodi yachiwiri ndi yoyamba migodi, doko LINAKHALA kuti lingakhale labwino chifukwa mulimonse simudzakhala malo abwino. Chonde onetsetsani kuti mutsegula chowotchingira moto ndikuwongolera kutumiza.
mining.ConfirmClearCachedCredentials: Kodi zitsimikizo zoyimbidwa ziyenera kuchotsedwa? (izi zitha kusokoneza kugwira ntchito molakwika ndipo sizikulimbikitsidwa)
mining.PortNotConnectableCantMine: Kuti ndikhale mu ma 1 kapena 2nd, tsamba lanu la p2p liyenera kulumikizidwa. Sitingathe kuloleza migodi monga momwe iliri. Ngati simungathe kutsegula doko, konzani migodi kuti ithandizire mu gawo lachitatu.

neuralium.NoTransaction: Palibe ntchito yomwe yapezeka pazomwe zalembedwera pano.
neuralium.Title: Neuraliums
neuralium.Explain: Chilichonse chokhudzana ndi Neuraliums mumaakaunti anu

send.CantSend: Sindingatumize kusinthanitsa. Palibe anzanu okwanira kulumikizidwa.
send.NoAccountOrAccountNotActiveOrNotPublishe: Palibe akaunti, akaunti siyogwira ntchito kapena yosasindikiza
send.NotEnoughNeuraliums: Osakwanira okwanira Neuraliums kuti akwaniritse kuchititsa
send.PleaseChooseContactInTheListOrInputConta: Chonde sankhani kulumikizana nawo mndandanda kapena id
send.Title: Tumizani
send.TransactionError: Panali vuto potumiza ntchito. Nambala yolakwika:
send.PresentationAccountId: Sitingatumize ma tokeni ku ID ya akaunti yanu yowonetsera
send.NotesDescription: Kalata yosankha yomwe isungidwe mu mbiri yanu yokha.

server.CheckingServer: Chonde dikirani pomwe tikutsimikizira ngati seva yogwira ilipo ...
server.ExternallyStarted: Simungathe kuyimitsa seva yomwe yayamba kunja
server.Title: Seva
server.Explain: Windo la ogwiritsa ntchito apamwamba omwe amalola kuti azisamalira seva ya Neuralium node.

settings.Title: Makonda
settings.Explain: Zosankha zingapo zomwe mungasinthe kuti muthe kukongoletsa chikwama chanu.

tools.Title: Zida
tools.Explain: Zida zogwiritsidwa ntchito kuti zithandizire kukulitsa luso lanu la Neuralium.

testMode.ParagrahOne: Muli pano mu mtundu wa TESTNET. Mtundu wa testnet umangotanthauza kuyesa zinthu zatsopano zomwe mwina sizingagwire monga momwe timafunira. Mutha kufotokozera nsikidzi, mavuto kapena malingaliro omwe mungakhale nawo pazomwe tinadzipereka.
testMode.ParagrahTwo: Mumachitidwe a TESTNET, ma tokeni onse a neuralium omwe amapezeka ndiongoyesa kokha ndipo sangathe kugwiritsidwa ntchito pamaneti a 'MainNet'. Ma Tokeni opezeka mumtundu wa TESTNET amathanso kutayika kapena kukonza nthawi ina iliyonse popanda kuzindikira.
testMode.Warning: Node ndi chikwama pakadali pano zili mu Njira ya TestNet pamaneti ena.
testMode.Period: Kumanga kwa TESTNET uku ndi kovomerezeka mpaka Ogasiti 18th 2020.

wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfValidatorSecret: phassphrase ya encryption ya Super Key
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfValidatorVerifi: phassphrase ya encryption ya Super Key
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfBackupKey: phassphrase ya encryption ya Super Key
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfChangeKey: Phassphrase ya encryption ya Change Key
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfTransactionKey: Phassphrase ya encryption ya Transaction Key
wallet.PleaseCreateOrCopy: Pangani chikwama chatsopano kapena kukweza chomwe chilipo.
wallet.WalletWaitMessage: Tikupanga akaunti yanu ndi makiyi a chitetezo. Izi zitha kutenga mphindi zingapo. Zikomo chifukwa cha chipiriro chanu.
wallet.Completed: Chikwama chanu chidapangidwa bwino. Tsopano potsatira, tikukulimbikitsani kuti musunge chikwatu chilichonse chachikwama. Timalimbikitsanso kuti muthe kuchotsa kiyi yapamwamba mufoda yanu ndikusunga mosamala pagalimoto kunja kwa kompyuta yanu.
wallet.WalletPath: Mutha kupeza chikwama chanu chatsopano m'njira zotsatirazi
